Item: M5 fender washers (pack of 50) only 12 needed
M3 Locknuts (Not needed on Motor Mount)
M5 Tee Nuts about 72 needed(Pack of 100)

Notes: The washers I used were precision washers
from openbuilds if you can find them

QTY: Parts for optional 3D printed wobble disc

Link: Best price I found was from https://app.prototi.com/quote

Item: 4 Pcs M5x200mm 304 SS Threaded Rod (only 1 needed)
M5 Hex Nuts (Use 4mm wide nuts, NOT narrow jam nut)
Notes: Narrow jam nuts make it more difficult to get wrench on
Not completely necessary but covers more of threaded rod

Item: 10 pack of 5mm Bore shaft lock collars SS (only 1 needed)
Notes: These do not have to be SS since they are outside sifter

Item: 5mm bore motor hex coupler, M4 threads on opposite side
Notes: Connects Motor to Sun gear and planets to main shaft
These connect planetary gear to M4 bore of hex couple on
you might want to get a couple of 20mm & 30mm length
in case those lengths work better for you.
